units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Ghost
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

player.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Prophet
units.prompt: Use foresight early to give your team intel. Target enemy specters with mind_spike to break cloak. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

units.name: Bolt
